Step = 0
r1 = (0.75000000; 0.75000000; 0.50000000)
r2 = (1.25000000; 0.75000000; 0.50000000)
r12 = (-0.50000000; 0.00000000; 0.00000000)
r21 = (0.50000000; 0.00000000; 0.00000000)
r12_abs = 0.50000000
r12_abs = 0.50000000
(rx12; ry12; rz12) / r12_abs = (-1.00000000; 0.00000000; 0.00000000)
(rx21; ry21; rz21) / r21_abs = (1.00000000; 0.00000000; 0.00000000)
v1 = (vx1; vy1; vz1) = (1.00000000; 1.00000000; 0.00000000)
v2 = (vx2; vy2; vz2) = (-1.00000000; 1.00000000; 0.00000000)
